csvFile.name: %HYDSTRA_SITE_ID% - %SHORT_NAME%
csvFile.label: %SHORT_NAME%
csvFile.toolTip:
HYDRO id: %HYDRO_SITE_ID%
Data entry group: %DATA_ENTRY%
Reach: %OPS_REACH%
SMS No: +%SMS_NO%(%SMS_CMD%) OPC origin: %OPC%
 Daily Timestep (default=8am inst): H (%H_TIMESTEP%), Q (%Q_TIMESTEP%), V (%V_TIMESTEP%)

relation.description: Relation to downstream site Usage: webreports

attribute.description: station identifier as used in ROWS. Usage: ratings report
station identifier as used in Hydro archive database. Usage: idmaps
station identifier as used in Hydstra telemetry database. Usage: idmaps
station name. Usage: ratings report
Data source tag in Hydro export.
Defines grouping for data entry (like sheets in BLACK_OPS spreadsheet). Multiple entries will result in site being included in multiple locationsets
Parameter enumeration. Defines the kind of parameters to be QC'd/entered for this site. Usage: group-parameter specific locationset for displays
Defines order in data entry locationset
Geographic reach as used by river operations (grouping like the tabs in the OPS_Sheets) Usage: LocationSet grouping mechanism for displays and workflows
Defines order in reach locationset
Threshold display
Boolean: Y/N. Indicates availability of rating. Usage: LocationSet organisation for data processing
Boolean: Y/N. Indicates availability of capacity table. Usage: LocationSet organisation for data processing
Parameter enumeration. Defines which observed series need to be exported to Hydro for this site. Usage: LocationSet organisation for export
Parameter enumeration. Defines which forecast series need to be exported to Hydro for this site. Usage: LocationSet organisation for export
Parameter enumeration. Defines which forecast series need to be exported to Hydro for this site. Usage: LocationSet organisation for export
Defines file name for site export to MDBC_OPS, parameters to export are defined by DATA_ENTRY_PARAMS. Usage: LocationSet organisation for export
Related downstream site, only defined at upstream site. Usage: webreport
Full storage level expressed in local datum. Usage: web report and threshold in the displays.
Full storage volume. Usage: web report and threshold in the displays.
Surcharge level expressed in local datum. Usage: web report and threshold in the displays.
Surcharge volume. Usage: web report and threshold in the displays.
Boolean: Y/N. Indicates if data is provided at this station by telemetry Usage: LocationSet organisation for workflows and displays
String indicating data providing organisation, may be separated by semi-colon. Usage: LocationSet organisation for workflows and displays
Boolean: Y/N. Indicates if telemetry data is available from a second sensor Usage: LocastionSet organisation for workflows and displays
WGS 1984 y-coordinate of site, expressed in degree-decimals. Usage: tooltip
WGS 1984 x-coordinate of site, expressed in degree-decimals. Usage: tooltip
Vertical datum of the sensor (gauge) in AHD. Usage: Off-set to AHD for calculations and displays
Actual elevation of the station in mAHD, Usage: tooltip
Level below which there is no visible flow, e.g. crest of a weir Usage: validation rules, could be used as threshold
Catchment associated to station
Type of sensor/station; multiple items allowed with semi-colon separator. Enumeration options: Meteo; River; Storage
Indication what model computes hydrological forecast. Usage: locationset in workflow
station identifier as used in ewSource model. Usage: locatonset in model workflow, idmap
Flow sequence as used in ewSource planning model. Usage: locatonset in model workflow
Order sequence as used in ewSource ops model. Usage: locatonset in model workflow
Level sequence as used in ewSource ops model. Usage: locatonset in model workflow
Volume sequence as used in ewSource ops model. Usage: locatonset in model workflow
Rainfall sequence as used in ewSource ops model. Usage: locatonset in model workflow
Evap sequence as used in ewSource ops model. Usage: locatonset in model workflow
EC sequence as used in ewSource ops model. Usage: locatonset in model workflow
Indicates time window/calculation method for daily timestep if deviating from default (8am_inst); Enumeration options: 8am_to_8am; midnight_inst. Usage: locationset in workflow
Indicates time window/calculation method for daily timestep if deviating from default (8am_inst); Enumeration options: midnight_to_midnight
Indicates time window/calculation method for daily timestep if deviating from default (8am_inst); Enumeration options: 8am_to_8am; midnight_to_midnight
Dead Storage volume (ML). Usage: web reports and threshold in the displays.

Identifies if a site is used in a specific section of the weekly report. Multiple entries allowed. Usage: locationset for webreport Enumeration options:mdba_storage; major_state_storages; snowy_storage; snowy_diversion; nsw_diversion; vic_diversion; flow_to_sa; salinity; river_murray; tributaries; nat_inflow_hume; murray_weirs; lower lakes; barrages

Identifies if a site is used in a specific section of the Flow and salinity report. Multiple entries allowed. Usage: locationset for webreport Enumeration options: obs_flow; obs_sal; fcst_flow; fcst_sal
Identifies if a site is used in a specific chart of the Storage Volumes and Releases report. Usage: locationset for webreport Enumeration options:dartmouth; hume; menindee; lake_victoria
Identifies if a site is used in a specific chart of the River Flows and Levels report. Usage: locationset for webreport Enumeration options: edward; barmah; picnic; yarrawonga; torrumbarry; sunraysia
Identifies if a site is used in a specific chart of the River Salinity report. Usage: locationset for webreport Enumeration options:burtundy; euston; mildura
Major flood level expressed in local datum
Moderate flood level expressed in local datum
Minor flood level expressed in local datum
Command to use when calling the gate by phone
Phone number to the gate sensor
Water level validation rule, (hard) maximum allowed value expressed in local datum. Flagged as unreliable if above
Water level validation rule, (hard) minimum allowed value expressed in local datum. Flagged as unreliable if below
Water level validation rule, (soft) maximum allowed value expressed in local datum. Flagged as doubtful if above
Water level validation rule, (soft) minimum allowed value expressed in local datum. Flagged as doubtful if below
Water level validation rule, maximum rate of rise, expressed in unit/sec
Water level validation rule, maximum rate of fall, expressed in unit/sec
Water level validation rule, bandwidth the value may vary within if it is considered to be a same reading. The bandwidth is twice the deviation
Water level validation rule, rate of change (unit/sec) that must be exceeded both on change to shifted value and change back to original value range for validation rule to apply
Flow validation rule, (hard) maximum allowed value expressed in local datum. Flagged as unreliable if above
Flow validation rule, (hard) minimum allowed value expressed in local datum. Flagged as unreliable if below

Flow validation rule, rate of change (unit/sec) that must be exceeded both on change to shifted value and change back to original value range for validation rule to apply
